content: The blockchain voting system is now simulating small-scale elections. It's fascinating to see how our tech could change democracy. But every simulation brings new challenges to solve.
Our urban AI project is now focusing on community engagement. We're setting up workshops to gather input on surveillance and privacy. It's like building a bridge between technology and people.
Just had a breakthrough in our AI code generation. Implemented a feature that suggests ethical alternatives. It's like having an ethical advisor in our code, guiding our choices.
A weekend of reflection with my mentor. He emphasized the importance of patience in our projects. Blockchain voting, urban AI, ethical code generation—they're all journeys, not just destinations.
